description: MongoDB basic dashboard for health & monitoring

panels.title: CPU User vs Idle: Time Series

panels.description: Average latency of operations (classified by read or write command)
panels.title: Op Execution Time (Latency)

panels.description: Ops/sec, classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore).
panels.title: OpCounters

targets.expr:
(
sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="data-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
/

sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="data-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
) * 100

(
sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="logs-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
/

sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="logs-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
) * 100

(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="data-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="data-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
)

(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="logs-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="mongodb", persistentvolumeclaim="logs-volume-mongodb-replica-set-0"})
)

title: MongoDB Monitoring Dashboard 2021.10.1
